GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.4.225
GSD.description:
drbd: use after free in drbd_create_device()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.225 by commit 813a8dd9c45fd46f5cbbfbedf0791afa7740ccf5, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit b6f85ef9538b2111a8ba0bbfae9aaebabfc94961. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drbd: use after free in drbd_create_device()
